inputs.description: Input image files in formats accepted by AFNI
inputs.name: Input image files

inputs.description: Filename which contains the interval definitions. Default is 'sfint'. Example: '3*# 5*rest 4*A 5*rest 4*B 5*rest 4*A 5*rest'
inputs.name: Interval definitions file

inputs.description: Task state name to use as the baseline. Default is 'rest'.
inputs.name: Baseline state

inputs.description: Flag to indicate if each non-base task state interval should have the mean of the two nearest base intervals subtracted instead of the grand mean of all the base task intervals.
inputs.name: Local base flag

inputs.description: Prefix for output image filenames for all states. The i'th interval with task state name 'fred' will be written to file 'pname.fred.i'. Default is 'sfim'.
inputs.name: Output prefix

output-files.description: Output image file for interval 'i' with task state name.
output-files.name: Output image files
